page.title: 16MEDIA - TELEVISION, BOOKS
page.content: {BOOKS}Puffin Books can be bought at school each month. There is a variety of books to buy. We also have a library at school,where you can change books every week and can take them home.The{library van}comes to Newbold every Tuesday and villagers can choose books from it. {TELEVISION PROGRAMMES. NEWBOLD SCHOOL CHILDRENS FAVOURITE PROGRAMMES. 1 Last of the summer wine 20% 2 Grange Hill 4% 3 Fools and horses 12% 4 Question of sport 4% 5 Hunter 4% 6 Morecambe and Wise 4% 7 Young ones 48% 8 Fragile Earth 4% The TV is mainly the same as a visual book but with speech in it makes it more entertaining.
